Plot: An unorthodox Irish policeman with a confrontational personality is partnered with an up-tight F.B.I. agent to investigate an international drug-smuggling ring.
Title: The Guard
Actors: Ronan Collins, Paraic Nialand, John Patrick Beirne, Liam O'Conghaile
tomatoConsensus: A violent, crackerjack comedy with a strong Irish flavor and an emminently likable Brendan Gleeson in the main role.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 14 wins & 25 nominations.
